about_the_game:
Vektor Z brings fast and furious retro space blasting action to Steam! Blast your way through endless waves of asteroids and enemies to write your name among the stars for all to see! Vektor Z offers both relentless action and vibrant visuals that is certain to have you playing again and again!

More than just blasting asteroids:
You'll travel through seven different sectors of the Vektor Z galaxy, each presenting its own unique challenges. Learning how to succeed in each sector as you progress through the levels is half of the fun! Each sector will give you tips on the basics before you spawn your ship there!

Along the way, you'll come across golden stars that can be collected and either saved for later upgrades or used near the end of your game to buy extra ships! Should you run out of ships at the end of your game, and you have accumulated enough Valor Starz, you'll be offered an option to use some to buy another life. But decide carefully, because any Valor Starz you keep will always be saved when you exit the game and can be used to buy upgrades that will save permanently to aid you in your future games! Valor Starz can also be used before or after each game to buy new colors and ship designs to get your preferred "cooler" look so you can play in style! The ability to keep your Valor Starz and use them to buy permanent upgrades that save until the next time you play makes Vektor Z an addicting rogue-like space arcade game that you'll find yourself returning to again and again!

Original, exhilarating music along with unique custom drawn art make Vektor Z an unforgettable gaming experience for both old school and new gamers alike!

---------------------------

IMPORTANT NOTE: This game is NOT a "twin stick shooter" and has controls seen below.
If you play this game expecting twin stick shooter controls, you're likely to be disappointed.

---------------------------

KEYBOARD CONTROLS:

W key: Thrusts you forward in the direction you currently face

A & D keys: Rotate your ship Left and Right respectively

LEFT MOUSE BUTTON: Shoots, Hold down or mash repeatedly to fire faster shots

RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON: Hyperspace gets you out of harms way and teleports you to a random location on the screen (No protection vs landing on an asteroid)

movies.name: Can You Prove You're The Best?

name: Vektor Z

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Higher
  • Processor: 1 Ghz CPU
  • Graphics: 512MB graphics card minimum
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 or equivalent
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 650 or AMD HD 6870 or above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

reviews:
“Dad, this game is fun and by far your best game yet!”
KydGamer (ZaxtorGameS teenage son)

“Vektor Z is a really fun arcade style game”
Slim G (ZaxtorGameS teenage nephew)
short_description: Vektor Z brings fast and furious retro space blasting action to Steam! Blast your way through endless waves of asteroids and enemies to write your name among the stars! Vektor Z offers a rogue-like arcade action game where you'll improve your progress every time you play!
